name: pure-javascript
description: Routing and styles[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D, modules and style

scripts.compile-styles: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 stylesheets/scss/styles.scss stylesheets/css/styles.css
scripts.process-styles: npm run compile-styles && npm run css-minify
